Christian Solis

Christian Solis Visuals EditorApril  

Three people are running for the Associated Students presidential position this spring PERIOD Whoever wins will have the potential to have the largest voice for students at Chico State PERIOD So we sat down with each of them and asked who they are how they would address sustainability on campus how they would manage the complicated balance between the AS cooperation and student interests as well as how their studies would influence their position PERIOD

The AS General Election will take place from  a.m PERIOD Wednesday to  a.m PERIOD Thursday PERIOD Students will receive an email containing a direct link to their ballot where they may cast their votes PERIOD

Listed below are the three uncut interviews for full transparency in alphabetical order by last name PERIOD







Christian Soliscan be reached atemailprotectedor calexander20 on Twitter PERIOD
